# Apple CEO Tim Cook gives 'clues' on the crisis that everyone wanted an update on

[TOI Tech Desk](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/toireporter/author-toi-tech-desk-479263800.cms) / TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Updated: Jan 30, 2026, 12:04 IST

![Apple CEO Tim Cook gives 'clues' on the crisis that everyone wanted an update on](https://static.toiimg.com/thumb/msid-127791571,imgsize-471101,width-400,resizemode-4/127791571.jpg)

Apple CEO Tim Cook acknowledged rising memory chip prices impacting gross margins, expecting further effects this quarter. The tech giant's purchasing teams are reportedly staying near Samsung and SK Hynix factories to secure long-term contracts for iPhone RAM. Despite a 230% jump in memory module costs, Apple's robust services business offers a financial buffer.
